sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><category display_value="ITSM IT Issues">140e2eda0b203300a1b16c2367673af4</category><connect_queue/><description/><flexible_conversation_switching>true</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "goals": {
    "07f1a6f6bee24e8e8e6b0442f7fce087": {
      "id": "07f1a6f6bee24e8e8e6b0442f7fce087",
      "trigger": {
        "type": "primary"
      },
      "name": "primary",
      "applicability": "",
      "description": "",
      "nodes": {
        "8131ddef60ff4e848eea20eba148513e": {
          "id": "8131ddef60ff4e848eea20eba148513e",
          "stepType": "Start",
          "name": "Start",
          "greetingResponse": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "128250f711cf4c90852d7fcf690eee3c": {
          "id": "128250f711cf4c90852d7fcf690eee3c",
          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "1a46bc59b186457c8cfbca1e1005d012": {
          "id": "1a46bc59b186457c8cfbca1e1005d012",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Which Software",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "What program are you having the issue with?",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": true,
          "entity": "Software",
          "variableId": "6799d3313a224438baed48024e3a9f48"
        },
        "63f54e829a2340e7bdd0b605355ce816": {
          "id": "63f54e829a2340e7bdd0b605355ce816",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Software acknowledgement ",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, give me a second to look up {{vaInputs.which_software}} in our list of software.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "d17da793dbcf46059b6badf17b765e70": {
          "id": "d17da793dbcf46059b6badf17b765e70",
          "name": "Lookup software",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var smGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_software_product_model');\n    smGr.addQuery('status', 'In Production');\n    smGr.addQuery('display_name', 'CONTAINS', vaInputs.which_software);\n    smGr.query();\n    vaVars.lookup_rowcount = smGr.getRowCount();\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "40e55d21f966409faa1ff759c9583d42": {
          "id": "40e55d21f966409faa1ff759c9583d42",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Contextual search",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var search_term = vaInputs.which_software;\n    var context = '2821675a5b30130070e4492c11f91a89';\n\n    var contextualSearch = new sn_itsm_va.VAContextualSearchUtil();\n    var response = contextualSearch.search(context, search_term);\n\n    var success = contextualSearch.processSearchResponse(response);\n    if (!success) {\n        gs.info('VA test was unsuccessful');\n        vaVars.count = 0;\n        return '';\n    }\n\n    var relevantSearchResults = contextualSearch.processGeneralResults(response, vaVars.limit, 0);\n    vaVars.count = relevantSearchResults.length;\n    gs.info('VA test ' + JSON.stringify(relevantSearchResults));\n    if (vaVars.count == 0) {\n        return '';\n    }\n    vaVars.search_kb_json_string = JSON.stringify(relevantSearchResults);\n    return null;\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "81f13a6a8c8949038d492ee922b5b397": {
          "id": "81f13a6a8c8949038d492ee922b5b397",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Did we find KBs? Is this supported?"
        },
        "d8b402e3fe304a7aa326a3d569826cc6": {
          "id": "d8b402e3fe304a7aa326a3d569826cc6",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Transfer to live agent message",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, it looks like {{vaInputs.which_software}} is not on our supported software list and I couldn't find any Knowledge Articles on this so let me transfer you to a live agent to get immediate assistance.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "6ce3dcdbd46b4764a3219bd671ddcf9e": {
          "id": "6ce3dcdbd46b4764a3219bd671ddcf9e",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Transfer to live agent",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      vaSystem.connectToAgent();\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "ae774cf229764b1f9ddfa08ca2efe2a6": {
          "id": "ae774cf229764b1f9ddfa08ca2efe2a6",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Create ticket message",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, I couldn't find any Knowledge Articles on {{vaInputs.which_software}} so let me create an IT ticket for you to get some assistance.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "676aabb69d3c44e2b68d981574a12123": {
          "stepType": "ReferenceChoicePrompt",
          "name": "Urgency",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "What's the urgency of this issue?",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "c02f2f4407c24b78b3400b5306187ab1",
          "id": "676aabb69d3c44e2b68d981574a12123",
          "mode": "external",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var choices = new GlideChoiceList();\n    // Getting all the choices for urgency.\n    var choiceList = choices.getChoiceList('incident', 'urgency');\n    \n    var options = [];\n\n    for (var i=0; i < choiceList.getSize(); i++) {\n        options.push({'value': choiceList.getChoice(i).getValue(), 'label': choiceList.getChoice(i).getLabel()});\n    }\n    \n    return options;    \n})()",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "Ok, got it.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "condition": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var choices = new GlideChoiceList();\n    // Getting all the choices for urgency.\n    var choiceList = choices.getChoiceList('incident', 'urgency');\n    \n    var options = [];\n\n    for (var i=0; i < choiceList.getSize(); i++) {\n        options.push({'value': choiceList.getChoice(i).getValue(), 'label': choiceList.getChoice(i).getLabel()});\n    }\n    \n    return options;    \n})()",
            "mode": "external_script"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": ""
        },
        "04d221ac978d4e5999edfef9b741702f": {
          "id": "04d221ac978d4e5999edfef9b741702f",
          "stepType": "CrudAction",
          "name": "Create Incident",
          "template": "caller_id={{vaInputs.user}}^short_description=Need some help with {{vaInputs.which_software}}^urgency={{vaInputs.urgency}}^contact_type=virtual_agent",
          "mode": "create",
          "record": "",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "variableId": "f7b6b36625cf4907b7b4cdfab24a734e"
        },
        "b38eca767d344acfbb592e7fb2081444": {
          "id": "b38eca767d344acfbb592e7fb2081444",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show KBs but unsupported message",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, {{vaInputs.which_software}} doesn't appear to be on our production software list but we can still help.  I was able to find these Knowledge Articles for {{vaInputs.which_software}}.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "33e31a1400f44c04b7d1d622694c14dd": {
          "id": "33e31a1400f44c04b7d1d622694c14dd",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Display KB Results",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      var kbs = JSON.parse(vaVars.search_kb_json_string);\n      var helper = new SaVaHelper();\n      var baseURL = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + '/' + gs.getProperty('sn_itsm_va.com.snc.itsm.virtualagent.portal_url');\n\n      var items = kbs.map(function(kb) {\n            return helper.formatKBSearchResult(baseURL, kb);\n      }).join('<br />');\n\n      var html =\n            '<div>' + items + '</div>';\n      \n      return html;\n})()",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "da810b8c2ce742abbddd1d910f83eff1": {
          "id": "da810b8c2ce742abbddd1d910f83eff1",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Was this helpful",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "Do any of these KBs resolve your issue?",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": "",
          "variableId": "2b2ca154df0b4bd39c33f1293310de80"
        },
        "1f94feaebeea44209016f4675e9b6c3c": {
          "id": "1f94feaebeea44209016f4675e9b6c3c",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "669b288a50d1423ebaf64e3f8deb31ff": {
          "id": "669b288a50d1423ebaf64e3f8deb31ff",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show KBs and supported message",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, I've found some Knowledge Articles regarding {{vaInputs.which_software}}.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "40b8abbd6eea41f8a4d5ec2f05c029cd": {
          "id": "40b8abbd6eea41f8a4d5ec2f05c029cd",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Transfer to live agent message",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, in that case, let me transfer you to a live agent to get immediate assistance.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "d3b805daf60c4eb981d948472c46832e": {
          "id": "d3b805daf60c4eb981d948472c46832e",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Display KBs for supported software",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      var kbs = JSON.parse(vaVars.search_kb_json_string);\n      var helper = new SaVaHelper();\n      var baseURL = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + '/' + gs.getProperty('sn_itsm_va.com.snc.itsm.virtualagent.portal_url');\n\n      var items = kbs.map(function(kb) {\n            return helper.formatKBSearchResult(baseURL, kb);\n      }).join('<br />');\n\n      var html =\n            '<div>'+ items +'</div>';\n      \n      return html;\n})()",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "0614050584c2448c8808327f42ca66b1": {
          "id": "0614050584c2448c8808327f42ca66b1",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Was this helpful - Supported",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "Do any of these KBs resolve your issue?",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": "",
          "variableId": "a3e100d965d94d1b9efe7206490f7b47"
        },
        "983843ac6e9a49f2982add9a69d56b2c": {
          "id": "983843ac6e9a49f2982add9a69d56b2c",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "21cfb2fe7b0e467ab29152045f0a8768": {
          "id": "21cfb2fe7b0e467ab29152045f0a8768",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Create ticket message - Supported",
          "value": {
            "value": "Ok, no problem. Let me create an IT ticket for you to get some assistance.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "ed5463cd85e747dd9728d12c8fa5118f": {
          "id": "ed5463cd85e747dd9728d12c8fa5118f",
          "stepType": "CrudAction",
          "name": "Create Incident - Supported",
          "template": "caller_id={{vaInputs.user}}^short_description=Need help with {{vaInputs.which_software}}^urgency={{vaInputs.urgency_supported}}^contact_type=virtual_agent",
          "mode": "create",

        "5b00c9411aa04132b1cc755d064668e6": {
          "stepType": "ReferenceChoicePrompt",
          "name": "Urgency - Supported",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "What's the urgency of this issue?",

          "acknowledgeMsg": {

          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "05f548eb87a646d394d953523268ff7b",
          "id": "5b00c9411aa04132b1cc755d064668e6",
          "mode": "external",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var choices = new GlideChoiceList();\n    // Getting all the choices for urgency.\n    var choiceList = choices.getChoiceList('incident', 'urgency');\n    \n    var options = [];\n\n    for (var i=0; i < choiceList.getSize(); i++) {\n        options.push({'value': choiceList.getChoice(i).getValue(), 'label': choiceList.getChoice(i).getLabel()});\n    }\n    \n    return options;    \n})()",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "Ok, got it.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "condition": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var choices = new GlideChoiceList();\n    // Getting all the choices for urgency.\n    var choiceList = choices.getChoiceList('incident', 'urgency');\n    \n    var options = [];\n\n    for (var i=0; i < choiceList.getSize(); i++) {\n        options.push({'value': choiceList.getChoice(i).getValue(), 'label': choiceList.getChoice(i).getLabel()});\n    }\n    \n    return options;    \n})()",

          "id": "94293979582e400bbc86a6bc6fc14b26",
          "name": "Set Live Agent Short Description",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    vaVars.LiveAgent_short_description = 'I need help with ' + vaInputs.which_software;\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",

        "63f2705d73b8465388ec0c5673eb1fc4": {
          "id": "63f2705d73b8465388ec0c5673eb1fc4",
          "name": "Add software to cmdb",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    // Can be uncommented with the addition of Software Asset Management plugin\n    /*var csp = new GlideRecord('samp_custom_sw_product');\n    csp.initialize();\n    csp.setValue('manufacturer', '63a098dcdbd73300b158a2b4449619d6');\n    csp.setValue('prod_name', vaInputs.which_software);\n    csp.setValue('product_type', 'unknown');\n    var newCsp = csp.insert();\n\n    var sm = new GlideRecord('cmdb_software_product_model');\n    sm.initialize();\n    sm.setValue('manufacturer', '63a098dcdbd73300b158a2b4449619d6');\n    sm.setValue('product', newCsp);\n    sm.setValue('status', 'not_supported');\n    sm.insert();*/\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        }
      },

        {

          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var smGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_software_product_model');\n    smGr.addQuery('display_name', 'CONTAINS', vaInputs.which_software);\n    smGr.query();\n    var rowCount = smGr.getRowCount();\n\n    return rowCount > 0;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Software found"
        },

          "id": "dd341294341246c1a2d124a668f2f6a2",

          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var smGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_software_product_model');\n    smGr.addQuery('display_name', 'CONTAINS', vaInputs.which_software);\n    smGr.query();\n    var rowCount = smGr.getRowCount();\n\n    return rowCount == 0;\n})()"
          },
          "label": "Software not found"
        },

}</graph><key_phrases>software,issue,program,problem,help,not working,classroom</key_phrases><live_agent>false</live_agent><name>Software assistance</name><nlu_intent>Get Software Help</nlu_intent><nlu_model>global_x_snc_nsw_ed_nlu_m_NSW_Ed_NLU_Mod</nlu_model><nlu_provider>64c023c17300330021a044764df6a70e</nlu_provider><roles/><sys_class_name>sys_cb_topic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>james.tandy@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-02 00:28:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cbaf7ea8db1c0c10b158a2b4449619e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Software assistance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Software Assist" source="x_snc_stwa">e31f3668db1c0c10b158a2b444961942</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Software Assist">e31f3668db1c0c10b158a2b444961942</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_cb_topic_cbaf7ea8db1c0c10b158a2b4449619e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>james.tandy@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-02 01:20:07</sys_updated_on><variables/></sys_cb_topic><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=cbaf7ea8db1c0c10b158a2b4449619e5"/></record_update>
